title: Feature Grid
description: Versatile marketing component for showcasing product features and benefits. Supports grid and alternating layouts, multiple column configurations, icon-based features, image-based features, and detailed features with feature lists.

metadata.description: Showcase product features in flexible grid or alternating layouts. Ideal for SaaS feature pages, product showcases, service offerings, and benefits communication. Supports icon-based, image-based, and detailed feature presentations with progressive disclosure.

accessibility.focusManagement: Proper heading hierarchy (h2 section heading, h3 feature titles). Semantic section and list structures. Icon decorative status.

usageExamples.title: SaaS Feature Grid (3-Column Icon-Based)
usageExamples.description: Classic SaaS landing page feature showcase with icons, titles, and descriptions. Most common pattern for communicating core product capabilities.

usageExamples.title: Product Features (Alternating Image/Text)
usageExamples.description: Showcase product features with screenshots using alternating image left/right pattern. Increases engagement and reduces visual monotony.

usageExamples.title: Service Offerings (2-Column Cards)
usageExamples.description: Agency or consultancy service offerings with card-style presentation for clear differentiation.

usageExamples.title: Benefits Showcase (4-Column Grid)
usageExamples.description: High-level benefits in compact 4-column grid. Perfect for above-the-fold value propositions.

usageExamples.title: Detailed Features with Feature Lists
usageExamples.description: Comprehensive feature presentation with icon, title, description, and nested feature list for detailed capabilities.

usageExamples.title: Image Grid (Portfolio/Case Studies)
usageExamples.description: Grid of image-based features for portfolio items, case studies, or visual content.

usageExamples.title: How It Works (Step-by-Step)
usageExamples.description: Process explanation with alternating images showing sequential steps. Common for onboarding and explainer pages.

columns.description: Number of columns (only for grid layout)
